this is a backend api for metabolicpoint.com site.
it is a single js file quering and updating database.
writeen in node js.
this is a demp api not best practice so need to follow same pattern

metabolic point process vital measures from your health (height, weight, waist, ldl, hdl....)
and recomended you about way of life, food, supplements and so

backend file - server.js
